verses.name: Matthew 12:1
verses.text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn; and his disciples were an hungred, and began to pluck the ears of corn, and to eat.

verses.name: Matthew 12:2
verses.text: But when the Pharisees saw it, they said unto him, Behold, thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day.

verses.name: Matthew 12:3
verses.text: But he said unto them, Have ye not read what David did, when he was an hungred, and they that were with him;
